a.title: AVISO ANUAL DE LA NO DISCRIMINACIÓN

li.a: AVISO ANUAL DE LA NO DISCRIMINACIÓN

img.title: GCHS Book Cart - Take a book, Read a book, Leave a book

div.p: Welcome to the Garrard County Schools, where our motto is, “Expect the Best”. This website will help you learn more about our school district and each of our schools. We are happy that you have taken the time to learn more about our district and all that we have to offer our students, staff, and community. Our dedicated staff understands the power in positive relationships between schools, homes, and community.

div.a: Garrard County Schools Closed, March 13 - May 1

p.a: The Garrard County Schools will be closed from March 13 - May 1 due to health concerns caused by the Coronavirus. Please see the attached letter for more information.
Online versions of the elementary and ATC packets available here
